allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 1: Setup development environment and tools

- Migrated to uv package manager with uv.lock for reproducibility
- Added ruff for linting and formatting with comprehensive ruleset
- Setup pre-commit hooks for automated code quality checks
- Updated CI/CD pipeline to use uv and include lint job
- Added Python 3.13 support
- Formatted entire codebase with ruff
- Fixed all linting issues (exception handling, imports, etc.)
- Updated pyproject.toml with dev dependencies and tool configurations

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Phase 2: Rename package to geoparquet-io with gpio CLI

- Renamed package from geoparquet_tools to geoparquet_io
- Updated CLI command to gpio (keeping gt as legacy alias)
- Updated all imports across codebase
- Updated project metadata and description
- Updated test coverage configuration
- Updated CI/CD workflows
- All tests passing with new package name

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
